alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 1:08PM MST until January 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY ABOVE 4500 FT IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the mountains, with 1 to 4 inches possible in some valleys above 4500 ft. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...Southeast Pinal County above 4500 ft, Upper Gila River Valley above 4500 ft, White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties, Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains and Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels could fall as low as 3500 ft, with little or no accumulation expected at that level.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
